item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-10
item.description: Facebook plans first smartwatch for next summer with two cameras, heart rate monitor (3 minute read) Facebook’s smartwatch will feature two cameras on a detachable display.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-31
item.description: Snap Plans Hardware Push With AR Spectacles, Drone (1 minute read) Snap’s next-gen Spectacles will be able to layer Snapchat lenses onto the surrounding environment without using a smartphone’s camera.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-24
item.description: Microsoft in talks with Discord over $10 billion-plus acquisition (1 minute read) Microsoft is in discussions to acquire Discord for more than $10 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-16
item.description: Barack Obama, Joe Biden, Elon Musk, Apple, and others hacked in unprecedented Twitter attack (7 minute read) Twitter accounts of some major companies and individuals were compromised in an attack that resulted in Twitter blocking new tweets from all verified users and locking all compromised accounts.
